translated: Then, holding a good begging bowl in one's hand,

original: de la gsang sngags brgya tsa brgyad bzlas nas zos na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la gsang sngags brgya tsa brgyad bzlas nas zos na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one should eat it, having recited the mantra one hundred and eight times. One will become invisible.

original: de bzhin du mi snang ba'i thabs 'di dag kun kyang 'di lta bu'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te mtshan ma thob pa dang zos na mi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du mi snang ba'i thabs 'di dag kun kyang 'di lta bu'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te mtshan ma thob pa dang zos na mi snang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: In the same way, all these methods of becoming invisible are consecrated by this kind of practice. When one obtains the signs and eats it, one will become invisible.

original: kha cig 'dod pa ni bshang ba zhes 'byung ba dang / bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga tshang ba yin te /
analyzed: kha cig 'dod pa ni bshang ba zhes 'byung ba dang / bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga tshang ba yin te /
translated: Some assert that excrement means the five nectars are complete,

original: 'di dang sha rnam pa lngar re re sbyar te ril lu bya'o zhes 'dod do //
analyzed: 'di dang sha rnam pa lngar re re sbyar te ril lu bya'o zhes 'dod do //
translated: and that each of these and the five meats should be made into a pill.

original: ga bur tsandan sbyar ba yi //
analyzed: ga bur tsandan sbyar ba yi //
translated: The pill made of camphor and sandalwood,

original: ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa //
analyzed: ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa //
translated: wrapped in the three metals,

original: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems kyi dang padma rakta sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems kyi dang padma rakta sbyar ba'o //
translated: means the union of bodhicitta and lotus blood.

original: rnam gcig tu tsandan ni bshang ba yin te de la ri lu bya'o //
analyzed: rnam gcig tu tsandan ni bshang ba yin te de la ri lu bya'o //
translated: Alternatively, sandalwood means excrement, and the pill is made from that.

original: kha cig ni ga phur tsandan nyid du 'dod do //
analyzed: kha cig ni ga phur tsandan nyid du 'dod do //
translated: Some assert that camphor is just sandalwood.

original: gi wang aa ga ru sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: gi wang aa ga ru sbyar ba'o //
translated: Mix with bezoar and agaru.

original: ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa //
analyzed: ri lu lcags gsum gyis dkris pa //
translated: The pill is wrapped in the three metals.

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang dri chur sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang dri chur sbyar ba'o //
translated: This is explained as being combined with semen and urine.

original: ga pur gur gum sbyar ba yis //
analyzed: ga pur gur gum sbyar ba yis //
translated: The pill is wrapped in the three metals.

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang khu bar sbyar ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad pa dang khu bar sbyar ba'o //
translated: This is explained as being combined with semen and urine.

original: kha cig ni 'di dag dngos bzhin du 'dod de ji ltar yang 'gal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: kha cig ni 'di dag dngos bzhin du 'dod de ji ltar yang 'gal ba ma yin no //
translated: Some assert that these are actual substances, but there is no contradiction with anything.

original: de lta bu'i sgrub pa de dag kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin nam rang gi rigs kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bya bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bu'i sgrub pa de dag kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin nam rang gi rigs kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bya bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that those kinds of accomplishments are to be performed by means of the meditative concentration of Vajradhara or the meditative concentration of one's own family deity, it says:
